verses.verse: To the chief <S%H5329>Musician<s%>, <S%H516>Al-taschith<s%>, <S%H4387>Michtam<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, when he <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H6440>from<s%> <S%H7586>Saul<s%> in the <S%H4631>cave<s%>. Be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me, O <S%H430>God<s%>, be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> unto me: for my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H2620>trusteth<s%> in thee: yea, in the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of thy <S%H3671>wings<s%> will I make my <S%H2620>refuge<s%>, until these <S%H1942>calamities<s%> be <S%H5674>overpast<s%>.
I will <S%H7121>cry<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%> most <S%H5945>high<s%>; unto <S%H410>God<s%> that <S%H1584>performeth<s%> all things for me.

He shall <S%H7971>send<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and <S%H3467>save<s%> me from the <S%H2778>reproach<s%> of him that would swallow me <S%H7602>up<s%>. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>. <S%H430>God<s%> shall send <S%H7971>forth<s%> his <S%H2617>mercy<s%> and his <S%H571>truth<s%>.

My <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H3833>lions<s%>: and I <S%H7901>lie<s%> even among them that are set on <S%H3857>fire<s%>, even the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, whose <S%H8127>teeth<s%> are <S%H2595>spears<s%> and <S%H2671>arrows<s%>, and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> a <S%H2299>sharp<s%> <S%H2719>sword<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>; let thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> be above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

They have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H7568>net<s%> for my <S%H6471>steps<s%>; my <S%H5315>soul<s%> is bowed <S%H3721>down<s%>: they have <S%H3738>digged<s%> a <S%H7882>pit<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me, into the <S%H8432>midst<s%> whereof they are <S%H5307>fallen<s%> themselves. <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
My <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, my <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H3559>fixed<s%>: I will <S%H7891>sing<s%> and give <S%H2167>praise<s%>.
Awake <S%H5782>up<s%>, my <S%H3519>glory<s%>; <S%H5782>awake<s%>, <S%H5035>psaltery<s%> and <S%H3658>harp<s%>: I myself will <S%H5782>awake<s%> <S%H7837>early<s%>.
I will <S%H3034>praise<s%> thee, O <S%H136>Lord<s%>, among the <S%H5971>people<s%>: I will <S%H2167>sing<s%> unto thee among the <S%H3816>nations<s%>.
For thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%> is <S%H1419>great<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and thy <S%H571>truth<s%> unto the <S%H7834>clouds<s%>.
Be thou <S%H7311>exalted<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, above the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>: let thy <S%H3519>glory<s%> be above all the <S%H776>earth<s%>.
